DOC.brief_title: Effects High vs. Standard Protein Intake Newborn Extreme Premature
DOC.detailed_description: METHODS : Types study : randomize single-blinded clinical trial . Time place development : Neonatology Service ( NICU , Neonatal Ward Premature Ward ) Unidad Medica de Alta Especialidad Número 48 , Instituto Mexican del Seguro Social Leon , Mexico , period 1st August 2012 31st January 2013 . This study approve local ethical committee hospital University Guanajuato . Informed consent request write parent include child study Inclusion Criteria 1 . Preterm infant le 32 gestational week weight less 1500g . Exclusion criterion 1 . Preterm infant severe congenital malformation 2 . Patients acute kidney failure . 3 . Inform consent form sign . Methodology For accomplishment present trial premature patient weight less 1500g less 32 week age include , also patient refer unit le 24h birth . Randomization carry use closed envelope assign amino acid dos , constitute two group : group A initial dose 2.5 g/kg/day daily increment 0.5 g/kg/day reach 3.5 g/kg/day ; group B initial dos 2.5 g/kg/day daily increment 0.5 g/kg/day reach 4 g/kg/day . The amino acid administer Pisa Laboratory ( Levamin Nomo 10 % , ® ) , follow composition every 100 ml : 511 mg L-isoleucine , 725mg L-leucine , 934 mg L-licina , 396 mg L-methionine , 724 mg L-phenylalanine , 514 L-threonine , 180mg L-tryptophan , 668 mg L-valine , 1025 mg L-arginine , 443 mg L-histidine , 1469 mg L-alanine , 40 mg L-Sistine , 1198 mg Glycine , 590 mg L-proline , 500 mg L-serine , 235 mg L-aspartic acid , 309 mg L-glutamine acid 36mg L-tyrosine . For study renal function baseline urea , creatinine BUN measure within 24 h birth order avoid alteration cost mother alter kidney function , afterwards marker measure day 7 , 14 , 21 28 . These marker measure use orto-clinical diagnostic series 50-0278 USA . The anthropometric measurement assess weekly person avoid bias ( cephalic perimeter height ) ; weight measure weekly use scale ( SECA model 3741321009 , Germany ) . All anthropometric lab result keep collection sheet . The presence sepsis diagnose use clinical sign systemic inflammatory response positive blood culture , necrotizing enterocolitis diagnose use Bell 's criterion permeable artery duct define connection aorta pulmonary artery leave right shunt ; death also evaluate . Sample Size The sample size calculate 24 patient group necessary detect delta 15 % weight variable ( beta error 20 % alpha error 5 % ) . 10 % loss assume , result total 28 need patient per group . Statistical analysis Central tendency measure use variable also chi square test qualitative variable apply , T-student test continuous variable ad multiple measurement ANOVA Test apply . The software use NCSS v. 8.0 ( Kaysville , Utah USA )
